Lukia Isanga Nakadama, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-ede ya Rukia Isanga Nakudama, bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego Ugandan, onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ osote praịm minista nke atọ nke Uganda ugbu a na Minista na-enweghị ọfịs, malite na 9 June 2021.
Tupu nke ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista Steeti maka Mmekọahụ na Ọdịbendị na Kọmitii Ugandan

A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ n'afọ 2006. Na mgbanwe nke 16 Febụwarị 2009, na nke 27 Mee 2011, ọ nọgidere na ọkwa a. Ọ bụkwa onye a họpụtara dịka onye omeiwu (MP) maka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Mayuge District
A na-ahọpụta ya ọzọ n'ọkwa ahụ kemgbe afọ 2001.
A mụrụ Isanga Nakadama na 2 Febụwarị 1970
A zụlitere ya n'ezinụlọ nwere ọtụtụ nwanyị, nwa nke isii n'ime ụmụ iri na abụọ nke nne ya
Nna ya nwere ndị nwunye abụọ ọzọ
Ọ gara Nabisunsa Girls School, ụlọ akwụkwọ etiti na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ọha na eze, nke dị na Nakawa Division na ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Kampala, isi obodo Uganda

O nwetara asambodo na nkuzi, tupu 1999, site na Institute of Teacher Education Kyambogo (ITEK), nke bụzi akụkụ nke Mahadum Kyambogo, otu n'ime mahadum asatọ nke Uganda, ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Febụwarị 2015
O nwekwara diplọma na Customs Clearing & Forwarding, nke ọ nwetara n'afọ 2000
E nwetara diplọma ya na agụmakwụkwọ na 2004, site na Mahadum Alakụba na Uganda (IUIU)
O nwekwara nzere Bachelor of Arts na Public Administration site na IUIU.
Tupu afọ 2001, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọchụnta ego onwe ya na dị ka onye nkuzi na Hassantourabi Education Centre na Mayuge District
A họpụtara ya na mbụ ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu n'afọ 2001, dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị maka mpaghara obodo ya nke Mayuge
N'afọ puku abụọ na isii , a họpụtara ya ọzọ ka ọ gaa n'ihu na-anọchite anya otu mpaghara ahụ
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ya ugbu a n'afọ 2006.
Rukia Nakadama bụ onye okpukpe Alakụba
Ọ lụrụ Hajji Daudi Isanga
Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement.
